sentences.en: a return to democracy after 16 years of military rule
sentences.cn: 16年军人统治后民主制度的恢复

sentences.en: Because of the indistinguishability of the electrons , there is complete electronic democracy.
sentences.cn: 因为电子的不可分辨性, 电子有完全的自由.

sentences.en: But the relation of centralism and the modern democracy is very intricate.
sentences.cn: 因此,集权制政治与现代法制在本质上是不相容的,但两者之间的关系却错综复杂.

sentences.en: Capt. Ramsey : We're here to preserve democracy, not practice it.
sentences.cn: 拉姆齐 船长: 我们是来维护人民的, 而不是来实践它.

sentences.en: From a philosophical perspective, Habermas discourse theory of democracy has universality to a great degree.
sentences.cn: 从哲学层面看, 哈贝马斯的商谈理论具有相当的普适性.

sentences.en: Peking University ( founded in 1898 ): Patriotism , Advancement , Democracy and Science.
sentences.cn: 南京大学 ( 创建于1902年 ): 诚朴雄伟励学敦行.

sentences.en: The new esthetic spirit emphasized science , democracy, nationalism and popularization.
sentences.cn: 新的美学精神以科学化 、 主化 、 族化和大众化为特征.

sentences.en: When these foundations are in place , democracy becomes sustainable.
sentences.cn: 然后, 你就需要市场经济和公民自由.
